Title: Zookeeper
Writer: Nick Bakay (screenplay), Rock Reuben (screenplay), Kevin James (screenplay), Jay Scherick (screenplay), David Ronn (screenplay), Jay Scherick (story), David Ronn (story)
Actors: Kevin James, Rosario Dawson, Leslie Bibb, Ken Jeong
Plot: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper find love, without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.
